nodes.bodyText: cosmetic change, but makes reading a bit easier.

This is the change what fixes the test flakyness, as it will now

wait for all stress monitors to be polled, which will then update tracer state
wait for all stress monitors to be polled at the beginning of steady paused state.

As tracer stress status isn't atomic, there is a race condition between "all stress monitors has been polled" and "update tracer stress state".
also, it seems that some failures were due to timeout being too short, a few measurements showed that it sometimes took between 30ms, thus there wasn't a sufficient margin under system load.
this change has also already been applied to master directly in the mean time.
